markdownRemark.html:
UI Reticles

The UI Reticles package provides customizable UI reticles and related scripts for controlling reticle behaviors in Unity. Included in the package are 12+ pre-configured reticles.

ğŸ’¢ Supported Functionality

  • Reticle Customization
  • Reticle Spread/Bloom
  • Reticle Targeting
  • Hitmarker Animation
  • Crosshair Editor
